strings.title: Angry Pigs üê∑
strings.instructions2: Hit as many birds as you can
strings.instructions3: The more you hit, the more you score!

fields.name: Shape of the object
fields.description: Shape of the object to dodge. Either `circle` or `rectangle`, else see an error.

fields.name: Score Increase Speed
fields.description: Number to increase the score by when ball is in the air.

fields.name: Score Decrease Speed
fields.description: Number to decrease the score by when ball is touching the platform.

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: High Score Gained Text
fields.description: When you get a new high score

fields.name: Max Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have
